page.title: 14Reading Habits
page.content: Mysteries, thrillers and crime novels were most popular. People read an average of just under one book a week. three fifths of the people interviewed used the public libary. People owned an average of 500 books. These reasons were given for reading 'it spreads your horizons' 'books are exciting and help you relax' 'passes time' 'to learn' 'to work the brain' 'to loose yourself' 'interesting' takes you in to another world' 'relaxing'. {Non_ fiction}books on the following subjects were enjoyed cookery , gardening, travel history, art and craft and music. About half the people interviewed read magazines.
